channel.title: Crowdfunding Collection #188, including every tabletop rpg project started between 01/02 and 01/16
channel.description: I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #188, including every tabletop rpg project started between 01/02 and 01/16. The first two weeks of 2022 have passed, and these are the projects started within them: English Crowdfundings 5 Roleplaying Games 1 Gamebook 2 Settings 4 D&D 5E Settings 6 Sourcebooks 4 D&D 5E Sourcebooks 5 Adventure 7 Dice Projects 2 More Dice Projects 2 Tokens 4 Dice Accessoires 1 App 3 Deck of Cards 6 Map Projects 2 Enamel Pins 4 Various RPG Projects German Crowdfundings 1 Roleplaying Spanish Crowdfundings 1 Roleplaying Game 1 Gamebook French Crowdfundings 2 Roleplaying Games 1 Campaign Article: https://teylen.blog/2022/01/16/crowdfunding-collection-188/

item.title: Crowdfunding Collection #188, including every tabletop rpg project started between 01/02 and 01/16
item.dc:creator: @Teylen
item.description:
@Teylen wrote:

I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #188, including every tabletop rpg project started between 01/02 and 01/16.

The first two weeks of 2022 have passed, and these are the projects started within them:

English Crowdfundings

5 Roleplaying Games
1 Gamebook
2 Settings
4 D&D 5E Settings
6 Sourcebooks
4 D&D 5E Sourcebooks
5 Adventure
7 Dice Projects
2 More Dice Projects
2 Tokens
4 Dice Accessoires
1 App
3 Deck of Cards
6 Map Projects
2 Enamel Pins
4 Various RPG Projects

German Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying

Spanish Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying Game
1 Gamebook

French Crowdfundings

2 Roleplaying Games
1 Campaign

Article: https://teylen.blog/2022/01/16/crowdfunding-collection-188/

Read full topic
